title: "AI to map NZ deforestation"
excerpt: "The Ministry for the Environment has awarded a consortium led by Wellington based geospatial data and AI company Lynker Analytics a contract to determine the extent of forest loss in New Zealand over 2017 and 2018. The ministry assesses deforestation in New Zealand every two years to meet international reporting obligations under the United ..."
